Access to and usage of this platform is subject to the following terms. Please do not use this page until you adhere to these terms and conditions. This website has been established by GMCI PRIVATE LIMITED (hereinafter referred to as GMCI) and is operated by GMCI. We reserve the right to discontinue or render partial or full changes to this website or to our General Terms and Conditions of Usage. Please notice that we can make these adjustments at our own discretion and without prior warning. Furthermore, the next time you access this page, we will remind you to check the terms and conditions again and to notice any improvements or modifications that might have been made.

Trademarks and copyrights

All trademarks on this website are the property of GMCI PRIVATE LIMITED or its affiliates, unless explicitly specified or expressly recognised as third-party protection. The illegal usage of these trademarks or other products is expressly prohibited and constitutes a breach of copyright, patent rights or other intellectual property rights.

Websites with third party vendors / links

The page includes links / references to websites by third parties. By having these connections, GMCI does not accept their contents. Nor does GMCI assume any blame for the existence or functionality of these websites or any liability for harm or injuries arising from the usage of such material, in any sort whatsoever. Links to certain websites are given to users of the website purely for the sake of ease. Users have links to these websites at their own risk.

International Users

This website is being reviewed, run and maintained by GMCI in INDIA. GMCI will not promise that the information provided on this website are indeed right in countries outside India and, in particular, that goods and services would be accessible with the same presence, with the same size or under the same conditions. When you call this website from a location outside of India or download content from that country, please remember that it is your own duty to insure that you behave in line with the relevant laws applicable there.

Sale of GMCI Products

Our products are offered in compliance with the latest edition of our Terms and Conditions of Purchase and Distribution.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
